title: A Zeit Spot in an Otherwise Shitty Day 5/24: Eternals, 53%, Kevin Spacey, Ttimothee Chalamet

description:
On this edition of A Zeit Spot in an Otherwise Shitty Day Miles and Joelle Monique 'The Eternals' trailer, Republicans' denial of objective reality, Kevin Spacey in the role of a lifetime, and Lil' Yung Wonka.
